Beat Culture Brewery - Brewery / Distillery in Miami, FL | The Vendry by by Search Inspiration Circles Log In Sign Up Overview Spaces Nearby Hotels Beat Culture Brewery Brewery / Distillery 7250 Northwest 11th Street, Miami, FL 33126, USA Beat Culture Brewery 7250 Northwest 11th Street, Miami, FL 33126, USA Request Pricing # of Spaces 1 Space Capacity Max Seated: 240 Max Standing: 500 We are a locally-owned and sourced, small batch craft brewery that seeks to redefine a one-of-a-kind experience by focusing on “all things fermentable” and creative seasonal food all in a comfortable environment. In our brewhouse, we craft traditional beer styles ranging from hoppy, fruity, barrel-aged creations, and addition to honey wine.  While in our kitchen, we create breakfast, lunch and dinner offerings resulting from a fusion of local cultures.

Small batches over mass production. Local over imported…while maintaining our sense of responsibility to our community and environment. The brewery consists of an 8100 square foot building with a 3200 square foot dining room/taproom along with a 1000 square foot private loft. All with windows opening into where we make all of our beer. Show more Show more Request Pricing 7250 Northwest 11th Street, Miami, FL Show on the map Spaces Full Buyout of Beat Culture Brewery Max Seated: 240 Max Standing: 500 Full Buyout of Beat Culture Brewery Max Seated: 240 Max Standing: 500 Do you work for Beat Culture Brewery ? Culture Beverage About Us Our Brands Become A Retailer Our Blog Contact About Us Our Brands Become A Retailer Our Blog Contact Culture Beverage Colorado’s Premier Distributor of Terroir Driven Beers, Ciders, Spirits, and Meads Culture Beverage Our mission at Culture Beverage is to bring beverages with soul to Colorado bottleshops, bars, and restaurants. We represent some of the world’s most renowned and sought after breweries and cideries, and our team is dedicated to helping our customers and all Coloradans learn more about fermentation and drinking cultures from around the world. Meet The Team Xandy Bustamante General Manager/Owner Xandy started his career in beer homebrewing at the University of Colorado in Boulder, and quickly realized the industry was his passion. Since then he has worked as a consultant in the South-east, co-founded a Colorado brewery, and worked in the Colorado cider industry.  With over ten years of sales and supplier experience working with over thirty wholesalers across the country, his goal is to build Culture Beverage into the ideal distribution partner for breweries, cideries, wineries and distilleries. When he is not preaching the gospel of good beer and cider, he can be found skiing or fly-fishing. xandy@culturebev.com Sheila Bustamante Business Support Manager/Owner Sheila has been working in the brewing industry for the past 10 years in marketing and business management before joining the Culture team.  Previously she has worked as the Field Marketing Manager for Heineken, Marketing & Sales Director for Eddyline Brewery, was a Co-Founder at Elevation Beer Company, and worked with several Marketing Agencies across the US.  Helping companies like Bear Naked Granola, Nintendo, Exotico Tequila, Microsoft and more.   Sheila enjoys drinking session sours, Czech lagers, and a good cider or vermouth. When she is not busy making sure the guys aren’t drinking all the merchandise, she enjoys traveling, hiking, fly-fishing, photography, and spending time with friends and family. sheila@culturebev.com Jimmy Sweeney Denver Metro Account Manager Jimmy has been heavily involved in the craft beer world since 2012. Born in Simsbury, Connecticut, he then went on to study marketing and business at Champlain College in Burlington, Vermont. It was there he discovered his true love for craft beer. Deeply involved in the New England brewery scene, he soon found himself working with of the top craft beer stores in Connecticut. He also spent time as a Brand Ambassador for Sweetwater, Sales Representative for Stony Creek Brewery, and as a Sales Manager for Thomas Hooker Brewery. In May 2022 he packed his bags and moved here to Colorado! Jimmy first joined the team at Ursula Brewery and helped them move from self-distribution, to utilizing us as their distributor. He then joined us to continue selling their beers, and many others that he is truly passionate about! When not talking craft brews, Jimmy enjoys traveling, attending concerts, snowboarding, and spending time with his family and pets. Stefan Beck Northern Colorado Account Manager Stefan is a Colorado native who has worked in craft beer for over ten years. He first discovered his passion for thoughtfully crafted ales and lagers working at the Mountain Sun Pub and The Kitchen in Boulder, and subsequently moving on to the distributor side of the business. Stefan's desert island beer style is a saison with brettanomyces, but his love of beer runs the gamut from German lagers to Belgian abbey ales to stouts and everything in between, of course including IPAs of all kinds. When he isn't talking beer, he enjoys playing music, hiking, cooking, and taking his dogs on adventures. stefan@culturebev.com Westminster, Colorado Our warehouse and offices are conveniently located in North Metro Denver at 11035 Dover Street, Unit 1200 Westminster, CO 80021. COntact Us Email us at xandy@culturebev.com to learn more about our company. Back to Top Meet The Team 11035 Dover Street, Suite 1200, Westminster, CO, 80021, USA

Best Lunch & Dinner Brewery Restaurant at Miami, Florida — Beat Culture Home Culture Beers Food Home Instagram Events Contact Store MBS Sign In My Account Home Culture Beers Food Home Instagram Events Contact Store MBS Sign In My Account Visit Us Located in the heart of Miami, you can find us just south of Miami International Airport. Whether coming from 826 Palmetto Expressway or 836 Dolphin Expressway, getting off on 72nd Ave exit will put you at our door step. Come try our spectacular craft beer selection. Our TAp room 7250 NW 11th Street Miami, FL 33126 PHONE (786) 857-6828 HOURS Monday Closed Tuesday | 12–10:30PM Wednesday | 12–10:30PM Thursday | 12–10:30PM Friday | 12–10:30PM Saturday | 12–10:30PM Sunday | 12–10:30PM EMAIL hi@beatculture.com Back To Top Contact form Privacy Policies Beat Culture, 7250 NW 11th Street, Miami, FL, 33126, United States (786) 431.5413 hi@beatculture.com Cart ( 0 )

Beat Culture Brewery & Kitchen - Absolute Beer Skip to content Absolute Beer Reviews News Beer 101 Contact Brewery Overview, Profile, and Related News Beat Culture Brewery & Kitchen Miami, FL • Est. 2018 Outside Beat Culture Brewery & Kitchen in Miami, Florida Beat Culture Brewery & Kitchen Beat Culture Brewery & Kitchen is a locally-owned and sourced, small batch craft brewery that seeks to redefine a one-of-a-kind experience by focusing on “all things fermentable” and creative seasonal food all in a comfortable environment. In our brewhouse, we craft traditional beer styles ranging from hoppy, fruity, barrel-aged creations, and addition to honey wine. While in our kitchen, we create breakfast, lunch and dinner offerings resulting from a fusion of local cultures. Small batches over mass production. Local over imported… while maintaining our sense of responsibility to our community and environment. Beat Culture is home to a five-barrel brewhouse, a barrel-aging room, and an in-house restaurant known as 3rd Heritage Kitchen serving breakfast, lunch, and dinner. The menu, curated by Jr’s Gourmet Burgers founder Jesus de la Torre Jr. will go beyond Torre’s well-known burgers to provide a constantly rotating menu based on seasonality. Beat Culture’s design — think 1930s and ’40s Americana — embraces retro inspiration while also giving the brewery a modern touch. Beat Culture Brewery & Kitchen is an independent craft brewer. Is any of the info for this brewery incorrect or incomplete? Propose an Edit Inside the Beat Culture Brewery & Kitchen taproom in Miami, Florida Tags: Beat Culture Brewery & Kitchen , Dade County , Florida , Miami , South Florida Beat Culture Brewery & Kitchen 7250 NW 11th St Miami, FL 33126 United States (786) 431-5413 Connect Online Twitter Feed Instagram Feed Send an Email For More Information Visit the Brewery Website Proud to Support Independent Craft Brewers For years, small and independent U.S. craft breweries have been turning the beer world upside down. Their ability to take risks, innovate flavors and build better communities has made the U.S. the craft beer capital of the world. To proudly display that independent spirit, the Brewers Association created a symbol to unify U.S. craft breweries and those who want to support them. This certified mark gives beer lovers an easy way to identify independent craft beer. Learn more about what it means to be an Independent Craft Brewer by visiting the Brewers Association . About Us – Craft Brewery and Kitchen **Welcome to CRAFT by Side Hustle** At CRAFT by Side Hustle, we’re not just a craft brewery and southern-style smokehouse; we’re Abu Dhabi’s (and the region)’s first, and we’re bringing the best of both worlds to your palate. **Our Mission: Real Connections** At the heart of CRAFT is our mission to encourage real human connections. We believe in the power of a diverse team united by their passion for crafting unique beverage and dining experiences for our community. Whether you’re a long-time resident or a newcomer, we’re here to bring people together over great food and exceptional drinks. **Craftsmanship Beyond Compare** Our journey began with a vision to create something truly exceptional. We’re proud to have award-winning leaders across our brewing, mixology, and culinary teams. This talented group crafts a constantly rotating menu of diverse beers, spirits & cocktails designed to complement CRAFT’s unique blend of cuisines, ensuring there’s something for every palate, no matter where you call home. When you visit CRAFT by Side Hustle, you won’t just taste our creations – you’ll witness them. Our open kitchen and brewery let you see our skilled team in action. At CRAFT, every dish is curated with love and authenticity. We take pride in preparing our menu from scratch in-house. From tantalizing spices to dry aged meats, each element is carefully chosen to bring the flavors of the Southern US straight to your table. At our smokehouse, we blend tradition with innovation, creating a unique culinary experience that captures the essence of craft culture. From homemade buns, pretzels and charcuterie to unique hop-inspired sauces & rubs, and a delectable range of dishes host of distinctive dishes including Cajun po’boys, jambalaya, shrimp and grits, and dry aged smoked brisket, join us on a flavorful adventure, where the spirit of the bayou meets the artistry of our kitchen. At Side Hustle, our brewers take pride in pushing the boundaries of flavor. In our first 12 months at CRAFT, we’re on a mission to create an impressive 75 unique beers, each a testament to our dedication to innovation and excellence. Among our creations, you’ll find the nation’s first authentic British real cask ale, a beer that pays homage to tradition while embracing the spirit of experimentation. Drawing inspiration from renowned beer destinations like the Czech Republic, Germany, the UK, the USA, and Belgium, we’ve crafted a diverse range of lagers that transport your taste buds around the world. While our foeder-aged beers offer a taste of complexity and depth that only time can provide. For those who crave the bold, you’ll find a selection of IPAs that showcase the finest modern aroma and flavor hops, along with the latest hop-based innovations, creating an unforgettable hop-forward experience. At CRAFT by Side Hustle, we’re not just brewing beer; we’re crafting memories, one sip at a time. Our dedication to craft extends beyond beer and food. We are committed to providing you with exceptional libations. We proudly feature the full range of Side Hustle Spirits, meticulously crafted to perfection with our local community in mind. In addition to our house branded spirits, we offer a carefully curated selection of bourbon and rye whiskey, each chosen to elevate your tasting experience. Our house-made mixers, specially crafted to pair seamlessly with our spirits, ensure that every cocktail is a masterpiece. If you’re looking for something truly unique, explore our draft cocktails, each offering a fusion of creativity and flavor. Our seasonally rotating signature cocktail menu guarantees there’s always something fresh to savor. And for those who prefer the classics, our wine list offers a robust selection that perfectly complements your dining journey. Whether you’re a foodie, craft beer enthusiast or a spirits connoisseur, CRAFT by Side Hustle invites you to indulge in a world of flavor and craftsmanship like no other. **Meet the Team** Craft by Side Hustle was founded in partnership between: – Chad McGehee & Jeff Karns (founders of Side Hustle Brews & Spirits) – Peter Samaha (founder of Quest Restaurants Management) – Nadim Selbak (attorney and restaurateur) – Adam Davis (UAE businessman and entrepreneur) – Elias Kanaan (entrepreneur & restauranteur) – Sam Underwood (Entrepreneur & Alcohol Industry Expert) – Paul Failoni (Entrepreneur & Alcohol Industry Expert) Together, we’ve poured our collective expertise and enthusiasm into creating a place where people can connect, enjoy exceptional food and drinks, and make lasting memories. back © All rights reserved.
